Athletics

Agtoberfest

Three hours before kickoff / Campus Farm

Join fellow College of Agriculture and Natural Resources alumni for a tailgate and hear from Dean Craig Beyrouty about the college’s strategic initiatives following statewide listening sessions that will inform its Fearless Ideas.

Learn More →

Greek Life Alumni Tailgates

Contact your chapter for times and locations

Fraternity and sorority chapters will coordinate and host alumni events throughout Homecoming weekend, so check with your organization’s chapter president or alumni advisors for information and details.

Learn More →

Alumni Tailgate

Saturday, Oct. 28 / 2.5 hours before kickoff
Samuel Riggs IV Alumni Center

The Alumni Association welcomes alumni, friends and visitors to its annual Homecoming Tailgate, an all-inclusive experience of food, drink and a whole lot of fun. Get your groove on to live music, play some tailgate games and connect with old and new friends.
